description: React component for user registration page, handling form input, validation, and integration with authentication context.

methods.name: Register()
methods.description: React functional component representing the registration page, managing user input and registration flow.

methods.name: handleChange
methods.description: Event handler to update form state when input fields change.

methods.name: handleSubmit
methods.description: Event handler to submit registration data to backend and handle navigation or errors.

calls: register({ name: form.name, email: form.email, password: form.password })
